snippet: The BG Group of Britain has agreed to sell its 60 percent stake in the Brazilian gas distribution company Comgás for $1.8 billion, as it focuses on energy exploration projects.
abstract: The BG Group of Britain has agreed to sell its 60 percent stake in the Brazilian gas distribution company Comgás for $1.8 billion, as it focuses on energy exploration projects.

headline.main: BG Group to Sell Stake in Brazilian Pipeline Operator for $1.8 Billion
